name: Save user's Unsplash statistics for a new Google Sheets row
description: Every time a new row is added to the Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically get specified user's statistics from Unsplash and save them in the same row in the Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses thisÂ [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1T0-yf7f3td9rtGbv-3d6mQQXqql5ANT3MrUbvwPnjFA/edit?usp=sharing).
